name: MotorMouth
0:
”Alexa open motor mouth”
”Alexa ask motor mouth where is my family”
”Alexa ask motor mouth to honk the horn”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motor mouth
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience peace of mind knowing that your loved ones and valuable vehicles are just a voice command away. 

MotorMouth features a robust set of tools to give you complete control over tracking and monitoring. From real-time location updates to customizable alerts, stay connected and informed with the safety and security of your family and Tesla vehicles at your fingertips.

HOW TO SET UP.

First, download the MotorMouth mobile app. You may find the MotorMouth app either on the Apple App Store for iOS and the Google Play Store for Android. 

Open the MotorMouth mobile app and sign up. If you're a Tesla owner, you can also connect your vehicle.

Once you’re done, enable the MotorMouth skill on the Skill Page of the Alexa App and then click on SETTINGS. Next, click on LINK ACCOUNT and complete the process. 

Now you're all set! 

WHAT YOU CAN DO.

* Keep track of family members locations ("where is my family", or, "where is Sarah", as an example)

* Monitor complex multi-leg trips, including air travel ("trip update")

* Keep track of vehicles in real time ("where is my car")

* Use voice control to conveniently track locations and control vehicle functions ("set destination" or "flash the lights")

* Define favorite locations and daily trips ("get my car ready")

* Preheat or cool your vehicle ("turn the a.c. on")

* Fully control your Tesla thanks to over 40 voice commands

* Works with iOS, Android, web browsers, and Alexa devices

Remember, you can always say: “Alexa, ask Motor Mouth to…” followed by a specific voice command. Example: “Alexa, ask Motor Mouth where my family”.

If you encounter any issue while using the app, please get in touch at support@motormouth.io - we’ll be happy to help.

Here’s a full list of the available commands:

Where is {name}? (to know where another profile is)
Where is my family?
Trip update

For Tesla owners:

Get my car ready
Where is my car
Set destination / go to {address or favorite location}
Switch vehicle (if you have multiple vehicles)
Get battery level
Get battery range
Get charge state
Set charge limit (50 to 100%)
Open/close charge port
Start charging the car
Stop charging the car
Open/close trunk
Open frunk
Lock/unlock the doors
Open/close all windows
Open/close garage (requires HomeLink integration)
Flash lights
Horn
Turn climate on/off
Turn defroster on/off
Turn all seat heaters on/off
Left front seat heater on/off
Right front seat heater on/off
Left rear seat heater on/off
Center rear seat heater on/off
Right rear seat heater on/off
Steering wheel heat on/off
Set temperature to 70 degrees (or any other temperature from 59 to 82)
Sentry mode on/off
Get outside temperature
Get coordinates
